howWeMet.title: How we met
howWeMet.text: We met in high school - he was smitten but shy (very shy), she was unconvinced. He stayed persistent (and mildly annoying), until she finally saw what all the fuss was about. Turns out, the friend zone has a back door... and it leads to forever.

firstKiss.title: The first kiss
firstKiss.text: The first kiss wasn't planned - it happened at a bus stop, somewhere between 'see you later' and something more (but let's not give away all the details - some things are better left off the internet!). As she walked away, she turned and caught him mid-air, jumping of joy. He then cracked open a tiny whiskey bottle she'd given him for his birthday, and toasted the greatest moment of his teenage life. Just him, the sunset, and the start of something unforgettable. Oscar-worthy, honestly.

proposal.title: The proposal
proposal.text: She surprised him with a birthday trip to Amsterdam - and somewhere between space cakes (never again) and tulip fields (missed opportunity), he carried a ring, waiting for the right moment. After a mildly traumatic misadventure, tulips were off the table. One day later, we went for a walk that led them to the Magere Brug. He nervously stalled by the bridge, then dropped to one knee. Emotionally stunned, she dropped too, embracing him. Neither of them remember what he said, just that she definitely said yes. A surreal, slightly chaotic, very 'them' kind of moment. It wasn't picture-perfect, but they've got forever to keep getting it wonderfully right. Every single day.

question1.title: Will there be transportation from the wedding ceremony to the party?

question2.title: What is the dress code?
question2.answer: Formal / Cocktail Attire. But bring something comfortable if you're planning to stay for the sauna and jacuzzi the day after.

question3.title: Will the wedding party be outside?
question3.answer: The party is indoors, but there's plenty of green space around. You might want to bring a light jacket just in case it's windy – it's in October after all!

question4.title: Are children allowed to join for the ceremony and the party?
question4.answer: Absolutely! However, we understand that children's bed time is important, so parents are encouraged to arrange pick up after the wedding cake at 22:00.

question5.title: Can I take photos during the ceremony and at the party?
question5.answer: Yes, you’re welcome to capture all happy moments. However, a professional photographer will be on site and we will be sharing all photos with you following our wedding.

question6.title: Is there a party...after the party?
question6.answer: Absolutely! Following the formal dinner, cake and dancing, guests will have an option to enjoy the sauna and jacuzzi the next morning.

question8.title: Will there be vegetarian options?
question8.answer: Yes! We will have a variety of options to meet everyone's dietary needs. Please let us know your dietary requirements in advance.

question9.title: Where do we stay in Vilnius?
question9.answer: There are plenty of lovely hotels and Airbnb options, including near the ceremony location. Drop us a line if you need recommendations.
